Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill is enabled using the resources provided from learningconnect.org. Please reference learningconnect.org to discover how Alexa can help students use their learning skills to increase student achievement and student success. Each tool provided can take student knowledge from surface learning to forming deep, long-term connections by activating the learning and processing skills that all students possess.Provide answers to common workplace questions
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
